regions.OABl: Optic to anterior basal lobe tract (left)
regions.OABr: Optic to anterior basal lobe tract (right)
regions.LBPCl: Lateral basal to posterior chromatophore lobe tract (left)
regions.LBPCr: Lateral basal to posterior chromatophore lobe tract (right)
regions.ODMl: Optic to dorsal magnocellular lobe tract (left)
regions.ODMr: Optic to dorsal magnocellular lobe tract (right)

children.name: Anterior anterior basal lobe
children.function: Higher motor control (movement of head, arms and eyes)

children.name: Interbasal lobes
children.function: Higher motor control (movement of feeding tentacles)

children.name: Median basal lobe
children.function: Higher motor control (movement of mantle and funnel during swimming and breathing, movement of fins, chromatophores and buccal mass)

children.name: Lateral basal lobes
children.function: Higher motor control (control of chromatophores and papillae)

children.name: Anterior pedal lobe
children.function: Intermediate motor control (movement of arms and tentacles)

children.name: Posterior pedal lobe
children.function: Lower motor control (movement of funnel, fins and tentacles; head retraction)

children.name: Anterior dorsal chromatophore lobes
children.function: Lower motor control (chromatophores & papillae on head and arms)

children.name: Anterior ventral chromatophore lobes
children.function: Lower motor control (chromatophores & papillae on head and arms)

children.name: Palliovisceral lobe
children.function: Lower motor control (escape movements and ink ejection)

children.name: Posterior chromatophore lobes
children.function: Lower motor control (chromatophores & papillae on mantle, fin and visceral mass)

children.name: Optic to anterior basal lobe tracts
Lateral basal to posterior chromatophore lobe tracts
Pallial nerves
children.function: Innervates the muscles and skin of the mantle

children.name: Optic to dorsal magnocellular lobe tracts
Collar nerves
children.function: Innervates the collar muscles and valves of the mantle

children.name: Visceral nerves
children.function: Innervates retractor muscles of the head and funnel

children.name: Head retractor nerves
children.function: Innervates the muscles that connect the head to the mantle
